attributes.action: Make marijuana legal in the UK for medicinal purposes
attributes.additional_details: Due to a large majority of uk residents already smoking it i think that it should become legal as there has been no deaths related to too much consumption plus it has various medical purposes.
attributes.background: Currently marijuana is illegal in the UK so i think it should become legal for personal and medical use.

rejection.details:
We're not sure whether you want cannabis to be legalised for medical use or for all personal uses.

We also can't publish petitions that include false or misleading statements, such as "a large majority of uk residents already smoking it". You can read the latest statistics on drug misuse here:

https://www.ons.gov.uk/peoplepopulationandcommunity/crimeandjustice/articles/drugmisuseinenglandandwales/yearendingmarch2020
